title: Etnosvet
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, European, Fusion, Czech
description: Opened July 2015 this vegetarian restaurant features an international culinary team preparing freshly made house specialties in the form of a bountiful salad and buffet spread as well an la carte menu of fusion dishes. Sample dishes like the nut roast Wellington, potato dumplings, or vegan steak tartar. For dessert try the lemon sponge cake or chocolate fondant. Housed in a modern design 3-story space. Next door is its vegan bistro & retail shop.
